property.name: size
property.label: Size
property.description: The size of the progress bar. Valid values are x-small, small, medium, and large. The default value is medium.

property.name: value
property.label: Value
property.description: The percentage value of the progress bar.

property.name: variant
property.label: Variant
property.description: The variant changes the appearance of the progress bar. Accepted variants include base or circular. This value defaults to base.
